title: Plan for a Reporter's Parental Leave
description: A reporter is going on parental leave for three months. Their editor must plan to reassign their beat and ongoing stories.

tasks.description: Meet with the departing reporter to get a full list of their stories and sources.
tasks.expected_outcome: The editor has a complete handover document.

tasks.description: Identify other reporters on the team who have the expertise and bandwidth to cover the beat temporarily.
tasks.expected_outcome: A suitable replacement reporter is identified.

tasks.description: Formally reassign the beat and transition the ongoing stories to the new reporter.
